website_summaries.verdict: A great advent calendar with quality toys for kids who love Super Mario.
pros: Toys are good quality and durable
Calendar also includes a pop-up background to play with the toys
Each toy is well secured in its compartment so it doesn't fall out
cons: Because the toys are well secured, they may be hard for little fingers to take out

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large figures that are of good quality. Picture above is missing a yoshi figure because my kid was playing with it at the time. I am using these as prizes for completing chores/academic work as it’s not Christmas themed it can have multiple uses and will be enjoyed for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Best advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this new advent calendar! We are using it as a reward system for completing chores. The box is super sturdy and can be used to play with. My oldest (6 yr) has already played with it without destroying the box itself, which is telling for its quality. The figures are great quality and will hold up for a long time. My kids have had the Tsum Tsum calendars in the past, which we love, but they love this one even more. Good value for the contents. I would definitely recommend this to friends with kids or any Super Mario Bro. fan. :)
customer_reviews.author: sabrina gowette

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys, but not much variety
customer_reviews.text: The figures are great quality. Vibrant colors. My biggest gripe is that it doubled on characters(yoshi,toad,luigi,flowers,mushrooms), and even tripled on Marios. There are so many other characters that can replace those. No Bowser (come on, he's the bad guy, a must character), dry bones, shy guy, cheep cheep. My son enjoyed the toys but was disappointed that there weren't other characters. Even asked why so many of the same. For the price you pay I would expect variety.
customer_reviews.author: Cate N.

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Advent Calendar Super Mario Christmas Holiday Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each of my boys. Love these new advent calendars. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Deb Mondloch

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it for mario lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present along the Bowser castle. The figures look nicely made and durable. I think my 3 year old who loves Mario will enjoy this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Akirah

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good quality advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: The fold out scene is very cute with pop up pipe, tree, and flowers. The pieces are a good size and good quality. Better than I expected. The one issue I had was that each piece is secured by a plastic wire in its spot which makes most of the pieces difficult to get out. I was worried that I would scratch the figures when trying to extract them. It was a fun 24 days of characters!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: The bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This is legit the best advent calendar ever! Worth every penny! We bought our son the bowser castle and sadly it only came with bowser. I started to look online for characters that we can add but they were so expensive and very random. We decided to buy this advent calendar so he can have a variety of characters and boy, did we hit the jackpot! Some of the characters even have moving body parts! Star, bullet, boo, flower power, you name it! Just go buy it, seriously!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and making various advent calendars for my niece and two nephews each year. This one was given to my eight year-old nephew, who LOVES it. And every single day is a figure, so it's a lot of value for the money. The figures are sometimes a little difficult to pull out of their compartments, as the molded tray they are set in is very tightly fit. But once they're out, they're awesome. And the box has pop-up items, too, so they can build an adorable Mario Bros. diorama. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Packaging requires parental assistance
customer_reviews.text: So far, we’re only a few days into this calendar, but so far, so good. The toys inside have thus far been character toys and appear to be a molded hard rubber. With other advent calendars I’ve used, in the past, the toys haven’t stayed in their compartments well, so one day you’ll have a bonus, but another you’ll find nothing. This overcomes that problem with molded compartments and rubber ties, but the ties can be difficult to remove, making the process difficult for a little one to do alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tchasse

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar, kids were thrilled
customer_reviews.text: The figures are all great: well painted, proportional, posable. The $50 price point seems expensive, but each figure comes out to only about $2 each, which is a bargain when you consider how much other WoN figures are. I bought the Bowser castle for the kids to open on day 25 and they a complete Mario diorama to play with. There are a few doubles by way of recolors, but all the basic characters are already represented, so I was fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbabe531

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: My Mario loving child is absolutely thrilled with this. We are very happy with the figures, they’re a quality plastic and very durable for the most part. I say most part because my not so gentle four year old broke Toad’s arm off. Some if the figures have moving parts, like Toad’s arm...formerly. I think this advent calendar pairs very nicely with the Bowser castle that he will get for Christmas. He’s super happy with it, so I’m happy. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best advent calendar purchases. In the past I’ve bought hatchimal ones where some days it would only be some foam accessory to assemble for the hatchimals or the tsum tsum a couple years in a row expecting different characters but the same. My daughter was always excited with the character she got each day despite there being multiples of Mario and Luigi in different forms (regular vs flower power). She was hoping for a bowser but that was the only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: MCPamler

customer_reviews.title: Great, but overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: My son looooves this advent calendar. Since we have purchased Bowsers Castle for Christmas we thought this would be a great way for him to collect figures all month to use when he finally gets his present. The figures are the correct scale to use with the castle, and each figure is well made. Just like the ones use can buy separately in store. My only issue is the price....yikes! Honestly though, other than the price, we have no complaints. We also price compared buying them individually and this was actually cheaper...if you want the Jakks brand that will scale correctly with the other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking at this item, then you are interested in a Super Mario Advent calendar. This advent calendar is worth the price! Buy it! Our son cannot eat candy for health reasons. This is a great substitute for a candy food calendar. This advent calendar is more practical to play with than the Lego calendar of last year. Bonus: The action figures are perfect size for restaurant tables, airplanes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mario fans, this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I was not really thrilled at first spending $40 for an advent calendar however my son absolutely loves Mario so I went for it. The little figurines are actually quality toys and most have little moving parts and the attention to detail is superb. I guess you get what you pay for! He is 8 years old so I thought may not really be into little toys but he plays with them every day and is so excited and happy with every single one. Yes, i thought this was pricey but it is well worth the money. I am NOT a PAID reviewer. A real mom that wants value for the money! I do recommend this calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: Great characters- but beware if it’s loaded upside down.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the characters inside and everything about it is great- except one thing. The part with the toys came loaded upside down so when we first started opening the doors they didn’t line up properly. I had to open the whole thing and turn it and then by then we had already opened and taken out the wrong character for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Delos Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Just like it was pictured. Can’t wait to give it to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant due to its price. But after seeing the reviews I thought I would give it a try. Shipping was fast. My little one (6 years old) is a huge Super Mario fan and was thrilled to discover this calendar on December 1st. The figures are large enough to fit comfortably in her hands and are a perfect fit (size wise) for the Mario Mushroom Castle and the Bowser Castle. Overall ... my youngest one was excited to wake up each morning and couldn't wait to open another door on her calendar. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Awesome version 1
customer_reviews.text: Love Mario. I believe the is the first year of this idea. Would love to see a follow up with Daisy, Bowser, Rosalina, Baby Mario/Baby Luigi, Koopalings (Bowser's "kids"), Birdo, etc. I feel like this is excellent for the first year though. Would love to see a cape Mario, Tanooki, cat suit, fire power, etc. Honestly, I am surprised it was frost power and not fire power.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Nintendo gamer in your life!
customer_reviews.text: My gamer son loved this advent calendar! Lots of fun pieces. If I had anything bad to say, it would be that there were several pieces that were almost repeats. They might have been slightly different like a different pose or something, but there are plenty of other characters available in the Nintendo universe without repeating them.
customer_reviews.author: David P Weems

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by the quality and size of daily items. Expected a much cheaper version and so am pleasantly surprised. Only have opened the first 10, but Grandson is already wanting it again next year. The best advent calendar for Mario fans, you will not be disappointed. Wish all advent calendars would be of this caliber.
customer_reviews.author: LIBBIE BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son was so excited to get this as his Advent calendar this year. The figurines are great quality and size. He has been so excited to open each day to see what he will get. His favorite has been Bullet Bill and Mario. I was a little hesitant because it was a little more expensive than most, but I would definitely recommend especially for a Mario fan like my son.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase with great toys
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely an amazing buy.....I paid around 50 bucks and wasn’t sure if it would be worth the money we are currently into day 10 and my son absolutely loves this calendar. The toys that come with it are decent size and not tiny little ones I expected. This definitely was worth the buy. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Spendy so watch for a deal but my daughter LOVED this! She was so excited to get a figure every single day and they were pretty good quality. Princess Peach is pretty fragile. We have had to glue her back together a few times because her seams on top of her dress popped apart. My daughter (5) also really enjoyed that the box could be used as a playset!
customer_reviews.author: CSoegaard

customer_reviews.title: Mario for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this advent calendar. This is the 1 st thing my boys go to when they wake up and is helping them keep their patience for Christmas presents. The toys are such good quality. Many of them, I haven’t even seen sold in any sets. They have so many different characters and accessories. I would buy it all over again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Quenga

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed
customer_reviews.text: My son totally loved this. He woke up every morning super excited and racing to the kitchen to open the current day. The figures are well constructed, he even noticed that they were the same as some other ones that I had bought him. For the price I’d totally buy it agaib
customer_reviews.author: Benjamen Alford

customer_reviews.title: Great but...WHERE IS BOWSER???
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old loved this advent calendar EXCEPT there was NO Bowser. She was extremely disappointed by that. We got 3 Marios, Red Yoshi, 2 Toads but no Bowser. Otherwise, it was great. Nice, detailed figures. 17 character figures & 7 accessories (Star, ? Block, coin, etc). If Bowser was in there I def would’ve given it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: half-blood princess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collector item for all Mario fans!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Advent calendar - value for money - if all 24 figures were bought separate then would cost considerably more. Few points though to mention - why no Bowser? And do we need three Mario figures and two Luigi’s - could have had three more extra characters.
customer_reviews.author: Nate G

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity for our Nintendo fan!
customer_reviews.text: Price hurt a little bit especially when I didn't know what to expect, and still oww. However, beautiful, durable, standing plastic characters/ pieces (24) that he can display all year; I've paid more for pieces like this. Overall, very pleased for the surprise everyday and the quality of the Advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Glyterbugg

customer_reviews.title: The Coolest Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a Mario fan I think you’ll agree that this is one of the coolest advent calendars. At least it’s one of the best we’ve had to-date. Excellent value for the money and well designed/painted daily presents to count-down to Christmas or whatever you’re using it to countdown to.
customer_reviews.author: Troublebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Perfect for Mario lovers!
customer_reviews.text: So good! This has been PERFECT for my 6 year old, Mario loving son! The figurines are great! Very nice quality! They are the same or comparable to the ones that cost almost $5 each at our local Walmart! Waking up for school in December has been made much more exciting knowing he gets to check his Mario Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Tlg

customer_reviews.title: They toys are pretty fragile. The calendar is a cute play scene that kid fans will love
customer_reviews.text: The toys are super cute. There's even some (limited) moveability with the necks, arms, and legs. It was a nice touch that Princess Toadstool actually had legs under the dress and it wasn't a solid piece of plastic for the lower half of the figure. It was a nice touch to add power ups for Luigi and Mario. The toys, however, are quite fragile and didn't even last through January (poor mario lost his arms).
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: It’s Like 25 Days of Christmas for a Super Mario fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my son’s most favorite Advent calendar ever. Every day he wakes up so excited to see what Super Mario character is next. Every single one is met with excitement and smiles. Since my 8 year old is addicted to the game, this is a dream come true!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I got what I paid for. Nice sturdy figurines. Great size for little hands. Not cheap junk in color and shape. Great characters each day for hours of play. My grand-kids LOVED this. Will stay with this company for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Buchman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun take on an Advent calendar. A bit pricey, but the figures are high caliber and fun to open. Only complaint is some are doubles - Luigi, Mushrooms, etc. Would have been nice to get a Bowser or Rosalina in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: FrankS

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: impressed with this set. my 6 year old really into Mario at the moment and this calendar is better quality than most. so far he has gotten quite a few characters and a few power ups. I would say great buy for any Mario fan
customer_reviews.author: JudoNinja

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I am so stoked to give this to my son For his birthday. I know Christmas has passed but I just wanted the characters for my Mario obsessed 5 year old. The characters look very well made and I can tell they are going to last!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING advent calendar! The figures and accessories are great quality. I bought this with the thought that my son would use all the pieces with the new Bowser & Mario castle sets. Do not hesitate getting this set! Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Advent Fun
customer_reviews.text: Haven't opened it yet, as it isn't December quite yet - but the packaging is great and I'm sure the contents will be enjoyed by my favorite gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Faller

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calendar!!
customer_reviews.text: Best advent calendar! My son who is 17 years old loved getting this! He is a gamer and enjoyed opening each day to see what character he got. Well worth the price for what you get! Everyone kept asking us where we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool 1 time gift
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it, box it sits in is cheap and crappy presentation. She loved opened new character everyday. Some repeats. I.e mario and fire mario. But now i got a bag full of useless mario world characters. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Toyotatech21

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side of advent calendars, but for the Mario Bros enthusiasts it's worth every penny. My 6 year old son is all about anything Mario and Luigi so everyday he was excited to see what figure he could add to his collection. We also felt like this gave our 3 and 6 year olds a sense of time.
customer_reviews.author: NATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge Mario fan and absolutely loves this advent calendar. The packaging is adorable with a pop-up tree and flower play scene with the castle in the background. The figurines and accessories are very good quality and each one is nestled in the package and is secured. As soon as my son wakes up each morning, he can't wait to open his calendar. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: What a deal! Soooo worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, official, true to form toy figures. Great variety, and the order you open them had thought put into it. This is a steal if you consider how much you'd pay to buy each of these separately! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: daniellesublime

customer_reviews.title: Fun character set
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this set. Be careful taking the pieces out, use a scissors to cut plastic piece securing characters. Some pieces like arms r delicate, a few broke off when taking out, need to glue back. Other then that he loves the set.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product especially the price. All too often we have ordered Mario toys and they are not well crafted, the cheap and expensive toys alike. But with a son who is an all this Mario fan I thought I’d give it a go. And I’m so happy I did! It is amazing and I feel the toys are really well made and sturdy! In fact the Princess Peach is one of the best we’ve ever found when it comes to the details. Highly recommend this for any Nintendo fan!
customer_reviews.author: Chasenaiden

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved this. However at the end was a bit disappointed that we didn’t get a Bowzer. Other than that he loved all the different characters. So fun and good quality. Cut the plastic holding the pieces. Don’t yank out 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality toy pieces. Definitely worth spending money on. My daughter happens to love everything Mario so this works perfectly for her. She can’t wait for each day to open a day up. She loves this little tradition of event calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Molnar/Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because of the price, but it really is a great advent calendar! The characters and pieces are great quality and make the price worth it! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cute advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This was kind of expensive (about $49), but the variety and characters were nice. The arms were able to break off if not careful, however. My 8 year old son loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a Mario fan!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is a HUGE Mario fan. He loves it and says it’s the best advent calendar he’s gotten so far. It’s worth the money because the little figurines are well made and a good size. Came super quick too.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Warnaca

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Super Mario fan
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 6 year old nephew and he spent 24 days being so excited, he actually took the entire box with him wherever he went to show everyone his growing collection of Super Mario toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: My Nephew and Niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew and Niece since they both recently started loving Mario. They loved it! My sister said they would wake up each morning and be so excited to see which one character they would open up that day.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calendar - very worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The toys you get out of this are equal to the stand alone toys you can buy for about 5-12 dollars each! Goes perfectly with the Castle play set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Super (Mario) Cool!
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely pleased with this set so far!! The plastic on the inside was upside down, but I flipped it and my son had been loving this advent calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar for a Mario loving kid. Had full size figures (like they sell at the stores) so even though it was kinda pricey it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: No Bowser?
customer_reviews.text: I mean I can sort-of understand no Wario, but there is no Bowser in this kit. 24 days and no Bowser? This is a pile of garbage and will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Darthalf

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, but this set is amazing! My son loves it because it has sooooo many characters. It is the same quality of characters that I have bought individually in the past. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than buying separately
customer_reviews.text: The toys are well made and better than I expected. They are solid and a little heavy. The presentation is perfect for our 6 year old little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved opening these each day and the quality of the toys is great. The only thing I would change is how many of each character you get. There are some he got 3 and 4 of in different colors but other characters he didn't get any of.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an advent calendar for my daughter and she LOVES it!! The figures are extremely sturdy and high quality! You can’t go wrong with this for a video game fan!
customer_reviews.author: catherine totten

customer_reviews.title: Really epic calendar for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar was so perfect for my 9 year old! The characters are really awesome and each morning he couldn’t wait to open one. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit with my 6 year old son
customer_reviews.text: I know this was a little pricey for an advent calendar.... BUT it was well worth the money. Each character is pretty large and very sturdy and nice to play with. If you have a child that really likes the super Mario characters, they will really ENJOY!!!!my son is loving this calendar and he is 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Usually get Lego ones but wanted to change up. Kids loved it! Lots of figures and no day felt like a throwaway. Even the coin was a hit! No Bowser or Jr was disappointing. Multiple Mario's and two Luigis.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Great surprises for the Mario lover in your life
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the mario lover in your life. All great figures and super special items. Very impressed with the variety of characters. Would definitely buy for my friends kids again and again
customer_reviews.author: Beeze

customer_reviews.title: Lots of repeats. Only 1 princess.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of repeats and out of 24 there was only 1 female character. No toadette, no daisy, no Roselia. You have like 3 Mario’s but only 1 princess.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fun all December
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the Super Mario Advent Calendar he still plays with the toys even after Christmas. The toys themselves are well made.
customer_reviews.author: loops

customer_reviews.title: Great design and surprises
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but what do you expect when you pay for Mario’s name. The advent calander had me wondering what was next every day. Was very glad to get in time for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mario loving son
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. They include quality super Mario figured in every day. Expensive but better value than other advent calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Patti G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Mario lover
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loved counting down the days to Christmas with this advent calendar. He was excited about all of the characters. And they are the perfect size for Bowsers castle!
customer_reviews.author: 2boysathome

customer_reviews.title: Cute figures
customer_reviews.text: Fun calendar but the figures are a bit difficult.to get out, a scissors is needed so children may need help
customer_reviews.author: j rask

customer_reviews.title: Poorly done.
customer_reviews.text: Paint is off/askew on quite a few pieces. Definitely better advent calendar options out there.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This advent calendar was so worth the money! The characters were beautiful and well made. No messed up paint and definitely arent the cheap china knockoff toys that don’t pass our US standards. So much variety in characters
customer_reviews.author: Our family

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: A fun, candy-free advent calendar. My kids enjoyed opening and playing with the toys
customer_reviews.author: ricemilk

customer_reviews.title: For my mario loving kids
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment, sizes are good too. Joints are not movable but are easily put back if it pops.
customer_reviews.author: keroleen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: Every day my son wakes up first thing he wants to do is open this up! It pairs nicely with the other mario toys out right now. Considering how much these toys are individually this was a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the season. The children enjoyed it very much. We are all Nintendo fans.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Almes

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved loved this..I can't tell you is much..if you have a kid that loves Mario You need to buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mario.
customer_reviews.text: It was very pricy. A nice collection of Mario characters. Our son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, needs design help. Characters were repetitive and not holiday themed (not that it advertises this, but the set would greatly benefit from it). Have a chopstick on hand - it was our tool of choice for removing pieces from packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Best calendar
customer_reviews.text: Pair with Bowser's castle. Figures fit perfectly. We replaced the calendar with the castle Christmas night and my son was so surprised
customer_reviews.author: daniel McGannon

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to add more fun to Bowser's Castle. Well with the money.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great item!! Highly recommend for your MARIO lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome advent calendar!! My son is so happy and so am I! Definitely worth the money!! Items are held in place so they don’t fall into other days which I’ve had happen with other calendars. The character pieces are perfectly made.. definitely not cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Colbee

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome for any age
customer_reviews.text: This is too awesome! The quality is great, brings back memories ♡
customer_reviews.author: cherrypistol8

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to old chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: Great set . My 8 year old loved it. Tons of figures and accessories. It was a bit expensive but much better than old calendar chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the SM lovers out there!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome Advent calendar! My 9yr old loves this! The figurines are super cute and sturdy. One of our favorite calendars to date. If you have a Super Mario loving child like mine, it’s a great gift.

customer_reviews.title: Kid
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and so much better then some crappy candy!

customer_reviews.title: Good characters but terrible product design.
customer_reviews.text: All of the figures are tied into the calendar box so when you open and try to take them out it’s very difficult and requires something to cut them with. And it causes the other pieces you have set for display on the base it provides to fall over. Terrible design for a advent calendar esp for kids.
customer_reviews.author: The_Claff

customer_reviews.title: Get buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for the money! The figures are good size and work perfect with the Bowser’s Castle set up.

customer_reviews.title: If you love Mario, you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: The characters were bigger than we expected. Perfect size for preschoolers to play with. The kids loved opening and got a good variety of characters.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing advent calendar! Worth every penny. Each day you actually get a character of some sort. No fluff like stickers or card board cut outs. we loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Best advent calendar I’ve purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Best advent calendar I’ve purchased! Quality figures. Variety. Actually worth the high price tag. My 6yo son loves it! We’re on day 16. If you really want to know detail of which characters & other figures are inside you can go to YouTube and watch video of the calendar being opened.

customer_reviews.title: Getting it Next Year
customer_reviews.text: The part of the box that flips down not so sturdy, everything else very good. Pieces very durable except there wasn’t a buzzer and my grandson calls him. He wanted one and only one Princess Peach.

product_meta.title: SUPER MARIO Nintendo Advent Calendar Christmas Holiday Calendar with 17 Articulated 2.5” Action Figures & 7 Accessories, 24 Day Surprise Countdown with Pop-Up Environment [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Nintendo launched its first console in North America in 1985, and the rest is video game history. Nintendo has sold more than 4. 7 billion video games globally, including the popular Super Mario Bros. Franchise. Mario has since gone on to star in many more gaming adventures, allowing him to evolve into the beloved pop-culture icon he is today. Along with his friends Luigi, Peach, Yoshi, and Toad, this classic video game Hero has an enduring appeal for fans of all ages! explore the Mushroom Kingdom with this Super Mario Advent calendar full of surprises. Count the days down and reveal a figure or accessory Each day. Display them with the pop-up environment pieces and create your own scene. The Super Mario Advent calendar includes 24 total surprises from the Super Mario video game franchise. There are a variety of popular characters and accessories included to expand your Super Mario World. Each figure and accessory is hidden behind a numbered door so you'll never know what you'll be getting next. The unique packaging allows you to open up the front panel and and use the pop-up environment pieces as a display area for your favorite items. With 24 days of surprises, This is a great holiday gift for Super Mario fans of all ages!
feature_bullets: Super Mario Advent calendar includes 24 days of surprises
Count down the days until Christmas by revealing a new figure or accessory Each day
Display your favorite figures with the pop-up environment pieces to create your own scene
Each numbered door contains a figure or accessory piece from the super Mario video games
Makes a perfect gift/ present for holidays and birthdays (Christmas/ navidad, Hanukkah, kwanzaa, birthday)
